summary: Provides a backend that translates Qiskit quantum circuits into LaTeX source code using the Q‑circuit package. It constructs the circuit layout, inserts gates, controls, measurements, barriers and other visual elements, handles register indexing and formatting, and returns a compilable LaTeX string.
business_intent: Allows developers and researchers to embed high‑quality, publication‑ready visualizations of quantum circuits directly in LaTeX documents, simplifying documentation, presentation, and analysis of quantum algorithms.
